chunks.chunk_text: June Foray was often called the First Lady of voice acting. Her career spanned almost 80 years, from radio in the 1930s to cartoons in the 21st century. Foray voiced a wide array of beloved characters, including Rocky the Flying Squirrel and Natasha Fatale from The Rocky and Bullwinkle Show.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.7 _ 知名配音師語錄 Inspirations quotes from top voice act.json

chunks.chunk_text: Lily Lohu in How the Grinch Stole Christmas and Granny in the Sylvester and Tweety cartoons. Despite her immense talent and prolific career, Foray remained humble and passionate about her work throughout her life. She was a founding member of ASIFA Hollywood, which created the Annie Awards to recognize excellence in animation. In a fitting tribute, ASIFA Hollywood created
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.7 _ 知名配音師語錄 Inspirations quotes from top voice act.json

chunks.chunk_text: the June Foray Award in 1995 to honor individuals who have made significant contributions to animation. Foray herself was the first recipient of this award named in her honor.

chunks.chunk_text: May tend to take the same direction as everybody else. Frank Oz is a multi-talented artist known for his work as a puppeteer, actor and director. However, his voice acting has left an indelible mark on popular culture. Oz is perhaps best known as the voice of Yoda from the Star Wars franchise, bringing wisdom and gravitas to the tiny Jedi Master. He also voiced Miss Piggy,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.7 _ 知名配音師語錄 Inspirations quotes from top voice act.json

chunks.chunk_text: Buzzy Bear and other characters in The Muppet Show, and various characters on Sesame Street, including Cookie Monster and Bert. Oz's approach to voice acting involves fully embodying his characters. For Yoda, he created a complete backstory and personality that informed every aspect of the character's speech and mannerisms. This dedication to character development has made his performances particularly memorable and inspiring.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.7 _ 知名配音師語錄 Inspirations quotes from top voice act.json

chunks.chunk_text: Beyond voice acting, Oz has directed several successful films including Little Shop of Horrors and In-N-Out, showcasing his diverse talents in the entertainment industry.
